page.title: 03CUSTOMS
page.content: {FASHION FOR THE YOUNG. When speaking with parents the children found that they had worn similar fashions to their parents. Nowadays young people have their own fashions.There are quite a few to choose from - Punk,Trendy,Heavy Metal, Mods and Skinheads.Punks are the most outrageous in their dress and hairstyle.This will include Mohican hairstyle where all the hair is shaven off except for a spiked ridge of hair down the middle of the head.They also wear safety pins through their noses and ears.Trendies have no particular hairstyle but just wear the most fashionable clothes.Heavy Metal followers support pop groups like Iron Maiden and wear old jeans,tee-shirts and keep their hair very long.Mods are similar to Trendies.Skinheads have very short hair and wear BIG boots.
